description: The Button Group should always be used when two or more buttons are positioned next to each other. The Button Group takes care of consistent margins between buttons.

props.name: buttons
props.description:
Either pass the buttons as default slot
or as an array to this prop

props.name: variant
props.description:
Styling variants - see `<k-button>` for details.
Default for buttons if not defined individually.

props.name: theme
props.description:
Color theme - see `<k-button>` for details.
Default for buttons if not defined individually.

props.name: size
props.description:
Specific size styling - see `<k-button>` for details.
Default for buttons if not defined individually.

props.name: responsive
props.description:
Whether to show text on small screens - see `<k-button>` for details.
Default for buttons if not defined individually.
